Class Yagura

    • code.Yagura

extends java.lang.Object
    Shoots enemy units within range.
    Author:
    Anish Visaria, Eitan Zlatin

        Makes yagura with characteristics given.
        Parameters:
        restState - rest image
        attackState - attack image
        attack - damage of attack
        location - location on y-axis
        range - range of yagura
        p - papplet object
        type - type of yagura
        player - number of player
